channel.description: Recent content in sequential on Jonathan`s Blog

item.title: [论文阅读笔记 -- 跨模态检索] Sequential Learning for Cross-modal Retrieval (ICCVW 2019)
item.description: Sequential Learning for Cross-modal Retrieval (ICCVW 2019) 概述 本文提出一种序列化跨模态学习方法，依次学习各模态，并提出一种元学习方法来处理灾难性遗忘问题。 模型架构 Meta-learner
